name: GoBlue
description:
Q*bert was an old arcade game.
For a game jam we changed it a little bit.
And made it into a collaborative game.
You need to color the whole map in purple, but instead of coloring a whole block once you jump on it like q*bert, you color only a side. Oh and also there is three player, each coloring a different dimention.
To loose you either jump of the map or two players are on the same block.
